responses:
To open your account you should come to one of our banks in person Don't forget to bring your ID,
 In addition, you should provide proof of residence only if your residential address is different from the address on your identity document

patterns: How can i get a loan ?
im i able to get a loan ?
How can i get a loan ?
i need to get a loan
responses: In order to benefit from a consumer or real estate loan, you must comply with the criteria for granting and eligibility for a loan, in particular a healthy financial situation and banking and employment seniority set by the bank.
